title: Eva Longoria surprised with mariachi band for her birthday
title_page: Eva Longoria surprised with mariachi band for her birthday | Daily Mail Online
text:
She celebrated her first birthday as the wife of Televisa president, José Antonio Bastón on Wednesday.
So Eva Longoria was treated to a special surprise from her husband of nearly 10 months with a mariachi band as she turned 42.
The Desperate Housewives star took to Snapchat and shared several photos and videos of her special day which began with a family trip to Disneyland in Anaheim, California.
Scroll down for video
'I'm crying!': Eva Longoria was treated to a special surprise from her husband, José Antonio Bastón, with a mariachi band as she turned 42
'It's my birthday today so I'm taking the family to Disney and the madness has already started. Jesus Christ, getting people in the car...,' she began.
Eva spoke directly into the camera and joked to followers before the amusement park outing had even begun, saying, 'We've got two car loads of Disney fun.'
While strolling through the Happiest Place On Earth, the brunette beauty played with several of the popular social media mobile app filters.
'My husband just surprised me!': She was overcome with emotion at her gift from the Televisa president

The former Telenovela actress even got her very own personalized Snapchat filter in honor of her special day.
Her animated figure was dressed in a skintight red mini dress with matching stilettos.
'Going on It's A Small World, now the song's going to be in my head the whole day,' she humorously griped in a high-pitched voice changing filter.

After meeting Mickey Mouse, the Texas-born stunner was content with returning home where she was greeted with countless bouquets of stunning flowers.
Eva lined them up and boasted to fans who sent each, 'These are from Mario [Lopez] and Courtney, these are from my writers, these are from Victoria [Beckham].'
'Of course my husband sent the biggest ones,' she gushed.

She's loved! The Texas-born beauty lined up the bountiful bouquets and read aloud who sent each including Victoria Beckham, Mario Lopez and his wife Courtney Mazza, and George Lopez
Tasty treat: Eva was treated to homemade birthday cakes as she blew out the candles with the help of kids in her family
After blowing out the candles on her cake, Eva was brought to tears as the mariachi band played in her backyard.
The Golden Globe nominee and Bastón got engaged in December 2015 while on holiday in Dubai.
They had been dating since 2013 and tied the knot in front of their closest family and friends in Valle De Bravo, Mexico on May 21, 2016.
